pages.text: Witchers are able to passively refill up to 3 of each potion type each time they sleep. Sleeping in a 5-block range of a campfire while holding $(l:crafting/alcohest#page_alcohest)[Alcohest]$() will consume one to refill any empty potion vials you may have in your inventory. Alternatively, the Witcher can refill their potions via $(l:potions/refreshment)Refreshment$() at any time of day.
Requires 1 $(l:crafting/alcohest#page_alcohest)[Alcohest]$() to refill. You can safely harvest unlit campfires as long as you use an axe.
